h2_title: Yaoguai Chief - Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top
content: Like the other pairs of bosses in the chapters, you'll have them attack you in succession. You'll start with Bottom Takes Top, who will cycle through two moves. He'll leap at you -- just dodge back from this -- and then roll into the ball. You can attack him while he regains his composure when he's inside it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_5_Secret-Bishui_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 5 Secret - Bishui Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top'.
The content is as follows:
Like the other pairs of bosses in the chapters, you'll have them attack you in succession. You'll start with Bottom Takes Top, who will cycle through two moves. He'll leap at you -- just dodge back from this -- and then roll into the ball. You can attack him while he regains his composure when he's inside it.
